translations.When activated, only members of this gro: When activated, only members of this group can access Mozilla Sync.
Set the value to 0 for unlimited quota.
translations.Error! You are not allowed to use Mozill: Error! You are not allowed to use Mozilla Sync! You need to be a member of the %s group.
translations.To set up Mozilla Sync create a new Sync: To set up Mozilla Sync create a new Sync account in Firefox.
translations.Mozilla Sync is set up, additional devic: Mozilla Sync is set up, additional devices can be added via Mozilla's device pairing service or manually.
translations.Has to be unique among all Sync users: Has to be unique amongst all Sync users
translations.Error! Duplicate email addresses detecte: Error! Duplicate email addresses detected! Email addresses need to be unique for Mozilla Sync to work.
translations.Attention! This will delete all your Syn: Attention! This will delete all your Sync data on the server.
